general.card_description: Default values, limits and thresholds for general operation.
general.minutes_inactivity: Minutes of inactivity until going into power saving mode
general.battery_low: Lowest voltage indicated by a single LED
general.battery_high: Highest voltage indicated by all LEDs

wifi.card_description: WiFi access data to enable this web interface and grant access to the internet for streaming.

ftp.card_description: The FTP serve1r allows file transfers from and to the ESPuino using common FTP clients.

mqtt.card_description: Integrate the ESPuino into home automation or other systems via the MQTT protocol.

system.card_description: System-wide settings. Handle with care as some of these might delete important data!
